events.message: I received my order yesterday, but it’s not what I wanted and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The system has categorized the issue as a refund request based on the customer’s message mentioning refund and dissatisfaction.
A customer service agent was assigned to handle the refund request to provide a satisfactory resolution promptly.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear that your order did not meet your expectations. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund so I can process your request quickly?
My order number is 123456789. The product is not what I expected because it looks different from the pictures online.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate the refund once you return the product. I’ll send you a prepaid return label via email.
That sounds good, thank you for your quick response and the solution you offered. I’ll wait for the return label.
We have emailed you the prepaid return label. Please send the product back within 14 days, and we will process your refund immediately upon receipt.
We wanted to check if you received the return label and if you need any assistance with the return process for your refund.
We have confirmed your refund has been processed. Thank you for your patience, and please contact us if you need further assistance.
